messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Any Colorado Unschoolers? (cross post)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/26/2007 9:27:31 A.M. Pacific Daylight Time, jparmer@frii.com writes: In late  Sept/early Oct we re going to be in San Diego; and we ll be
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/26/2007 9:27:31 A.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
jparmer@... writes:

In late Sept/early Oct we're going to be in San Diego; and we'll be
meeting up with some other unschoolers we've met at the Live & Learn
confs. So far the plan is to go to Legoland homeschool discount day
on Oct 8th, and I think Sea World on the 10th, which may also be a
discount day. You're welcome to join us.

~Jill


Oh, really?! What fun! It'll be PACKED on that day, but I'd love it! I bet
the kids would too. Yes, include me, please! It's a tad of a drive for us, but
that's ok - we live in Claremont...We can if there are DEF. discounts ;)

Let's talk more in the near future, or off list, k? Thanks!

Karen
Kidgie@...

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Any Colorado Unschoolers? (cross post)
messages.msgSnippet: I m in Fort Collins; we have the UR-FREE yahoo group.  In Boulder there s the Blue Skies 2 group. We like to go down to Broomfield and go to that cool indoor
messages.messageBody:
I'm in Fort Collins; we have the UR-FREE yahoo group. In Boulder
there's the Blue Skies 2 group.

We like to go down to Broomfield and go to that cool indoor pool,
can't remember the name, I get it mixed up with the one in Lafayette.

You could look for unschoolers by posting on the EHCO yahoo group
which is a state wide homeschooling list.

~Jill

On Aug 24, 2007, at 10:33 PM, Kendrah Nilsestuen wrote:

> Do any unschoolers get together out here? I live in a suburb south of
> Denver. I figure that Denver, or certainly Boulder would have some
> groups that get together...
>
> Kendrah:)
